entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow or rain or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
